Join the server and start playing the minigames!
gui.chaotic_minigames.options.music_slid: The music system has been completely reprogrammed! I recommend keeping it enabled for a better experience!
message.chaotic_minigames.not_enough_pla: Not enough players found to play!
Bullets will appear, and you must dodge them to survive.
minigame.chaotic_minigames.sweeper.name: Sweeper
minigame.chaotic_minigames.sweeper.descr: Avoid a spinning stick by jumping to survive.
minigame.chaotic_minigames.quick_drop.su: Avoid getting crushed by the ceiling!
minigame.chaotic_minigames.quick_drop.de: You must reach the finish line without dying. Be careful, as the ceiling will keep lowering until it crushes you!
minigame.chaotic_minigames.mine_and_shin: Be among the first to find the gems!
Mine until you find an emerald; only the first three will win.
minigame.chaotic_minigames.epidemic_rush: Escape from the zombies or turn the other players into zombies!
Knock the others into the water!
Use the ball to knock the other players into the water before the time runs out!
